mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carrel 4-3, east wall
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Donohue, Liam Patrick [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Weather diary entries; transcriptions here start from lower left of image; themes of frustration and a recurring motif of "F my life"/"FML." Doodle representations of 1st year (an egg with a crack? a seed?) and 2nd year (a flower in bloom) [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Time 6:20 pm | Dec 9, 2008 | Freezing with a low of F my life | Time: 2:31 P< | Sept. 22, 2010 | high: 94° F | FML | ↓ | 11/7/12 | high: 29° | FML | October 18, 2009 | I don't know why it's cold outside ←My B-day | ↓ | October 18, 2011 | 78° - Pretty nice out! | Time | 9:37 pm | March 30, 2011 | 37° F & rain! | ↑ my 15th birthday!!!
